name: Block Revolver 3D
description:
"Block Revolver 3D" is a simple rotate and match game where you fill the platform's impressions with the correct shape. As you continue to earn points, the speed of the dropping blocks increases to create more challenge along the way! Platforms randomize for a different experience every time.
How to Play:
1. Tap the screen to rotate the shape (90, 180, 270, and 360 degrees).
2. Some platforms accept 180 and 360 rotations, depending on the shape.
3. Use the left icon next to the score to determine the correct rotation.
You are your own Rival!
Challenge yourself to break the high score. The falling blocks speed up, as your score increases. Control the gameplay speed to fit your skill level with various difficulty modes.
